name: Balmorra
description:
• Modifications:
  • - Story tab that sets the goal for the player and allows them to better understand the context of the gameplay.
  • - Gameplay has been enhanced by changing enemy profiles based on the story, i.e. scouts are faster and veterans have more HP.
  • - Boss level which introduces a massive new enemy that poses a real threat to the player.

Created by Ronin Das
